message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. Based on its potential impact, I'm asking for $1,000,000.  This price reflects its worth, but I'm open to discussing a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $850,000 is unfortunately too low for me at this time. I'm willing to come down slightly to $950,000.  This still leaves significant room for you to profit, while allowing me to get closer to my desired price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $950,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
